column5: Got boat out today in river.........great to see it almost back to normal levels  I thought the boat had a carb issue but seemed great today...........at about 25% throtle it does loose all spark it seems for about a sec.........then fine for 5 sec and then looses spark..........   Runs like a champ at WOT and IDLE..  Any idea's?  Spark plug gap maybe??   They are bran new.  its a 91 or so 20HP evinrude.  Thanks Derrick
I doubt that it's losing spark. A gummed up carb would be my guess.
any easy way to check fuel line?
Yup, sounds like a fuel issue to me.  Check your fuel filter/lines. Something is blocked or sucking air by the sounds of things.    Sinker
